title: YouTube Music tests personalized ‘Recommended radios’ influenced by multiple artists
content:
In addition to a new “Add to playlist” UI for mobile, YouTube Music is testing “Recommended radios.” Compared to radio stations generated from a single song, this new offering looks to be compiled from multiple influences.

more…

The post YouTube Music tests personalized ‘Recommended radios’ influenced by multiple artists  appeared first on 9to5Google.
